    Northeastern University Courses

    EECE5644 Introduction to Machine Learning and Patter Recognition

    Summer1 2023

    Studied machine learning (the study and design of algorithms that enable computers/machines to learn from experience/data).

    EECE5554 Robotics Sensing and Navigation

    Spring 2023

    Examined the actual sensors and mathematical techniques for robotic sensing and navigation with a focus on sensors such as cameras, sonars, and laser scanners.

    EECE4630 Robotics

    Spring 2023

    Introduced robotics analysis covering basic theory of kinematics, dynamics, and control of robots.

    ME3460 Robot Dynamics and Control

    Fall 2022

    Covered fundamental components and mechanisms of robotic systems and their multidisciplinary nature.

    MATH3081 Probability and Statistics

    Fall 2022

    Focused on probability theory.

    EECE5550 Mobile Robotics

    Fall 2022

    Investigated the science and engineering of mobile robots.

    EECE2322 Fundamentals of Digital Design and Computer Organization

    Fall 2022

    Covered the design and evaluation of control and data structures for digital systems.

    EECE2560 Fundamentals of Engineering Algorithms

    Spring 2020

    Covered the design and implementation of algorithms to solve engineering problems using a high-level programming language.

    EECE2520 Fundamentals of Linear Systems

    Spring 2020

    Developed the basic theory of continuous and discrete systems, emphasizing linear time-invariant systems.

    EECE2412 Fundamentals of Electronics

    Spring 2020

    Reviewed basic circuit analysis techniques.

    EECE2540 Fundamentals of Networks

    Fall 2019

    Presented an overview of modern communication networks.

    EECE2160 Embedded Design: Enabling Robotics

    Fall 2019

    Covered the basics of the Unix operating system, high-level programming concepts, introductory digital design, wireless networking, and Simulink design.

    EECE2150 Circuits and Signals: Biomedical Applications

    Fall 2019

    Covered circuit theory, signal processing, circuit building, and MATLAB programming.

    MATH2341 Differential Equations and Linear Algebra for Engineering

    Spring 2019

    Studied ordinary differential equations, their applications, and techniques for solving them including numerical methods (using MATLAB), Laplace transforms, and linear algebra.
